name: Terraria
description: For those who don't have the Linux version of the game

task.description: Setup is being run in Wine...
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setupfile: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Terraria/Terraria.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Setup is being run in Wine...
    executable: setupfile
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
